CustomField.formula: IF( ISBLANK(LastActivityDate), "5. No Activity", IF( Days_Since_Last_Activity__c > 150, "4. More than 150 Days", IF( Days_Since_Last_Activity__c > 120, "3. Less than 150 Days", IF( Days_Since_Last_Activity__c > 90, "2. Less than 120 Days", "1. Less than 90 Days" ) ) ) )
CustomField.label: Days Since Last Activity (Bucket)
